{"doc":{"info":{"calaisRequestID":"ea5b7c25-33fc-ecf1-46f2-2753a65897ad","id":"http://id.opencalais.com/ee8Vn-calX7G5E4tHYSYFg","docId":"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/8df519c5-8ed5-39a0-8d90-14e8b60e8deb","document":" ￼Garrett 29/7/91 10:06 am Page 31 e Their faces ghost elsewhere; but someone\u2019s left His smile in a glass Beside the sink. The loving bubbles cling Where white and pink a plaster rictus drifts In mute suspense: smothered laughter doubling His collapsed lips\u2019 loss. When sourmouthed morning comes, he\u2019ll find them both - The laughter and the loss - Swallowing grief with the inward gasp of mirth, Putting senescence in its place, teeth In theirs, hiding pointless truth beneath The necessary false. Beneath the door, a strand of strawlight slipping Dawn\u2019s drawn lot. She\u2019ll try to sweep it out, the woman sleeping Cruelly bare without her body\u2019s apron Bundled here, neat, far from the undone Flesh, its careful knot. Thresholds Loosed in the yard like gangaboon hens, to grub For treasure sunk in mud; Flouting defense de, verboten, forbidden, we robbed Decay of its blistered carapace, breaking the crust In greed for communion: crumbs in our hands and rust In our mouths, like the taste of blood. Swung by day from disastered beams, swung Above splintered kingdoms of straw, / Tossed like chaff through asthmatic halflight, spun Into darkness, drunk on parabola, high in the crooked Rafters\u2019 cage, stalling the ripcord, hooked On the lapse of the backward yaw. 31 ","docTitle":"","docDate":"1991-07-29"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01 08:40:02.086","submitterCode":"57b17a53-6e34-87b0-20ff-a419896f49c9","signature":"digestalg-1|sB9CA6J6j7PbVxfj6zL3UBnfpsM=|Qs+bVR3B1OJjWHv3YWdyMjjYHs45e5GKf/MuRYe+Z/US1XokdRH1uw==","language":"English"}},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/8df519c5-8ed5-39a0-8d90-14e8b60e8deb/lid/DefaultLangId":{"_typeGroup":"language","language":"http://d.opencalais.com/lid/DefaultLangId/English"},"http://d.opencalais.com/comphash-1/dddc8d92-72f0-377a-a86e-44a693ff990a":{"_typeGroup":"entities","_type":"Company","name":"Garrett","nationality":"N/A","_typeReference":"http://s.opencalais.com/1/type/em/e/Company","instances":[{"detection":"[ ￼]Garrett[ 29/7/91 10:06 am Page 31 e Their faces ghost]","prefix":" ￼","exact":"Garrett","suffix":" 29/7/91 10:06 am Page 31 e Their faces ghost","offset":2,"length":7}],"relevance":0.603,"resolutions":[{"id":"http://d.opencalais.com/er/company/ralg-tr1r/471edc60-4ad5-3c44-98cd-91007a475500","score":1,"name":"GARRETT COMMUNICATIONS INC","shortname":"GARRETT"}]}}
